findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The _mint function allows minting an unlimited number of tokens without any restriction.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in transfer, approve, transferFrom, increaseAllowance, and decreaseAllowance
findings.description: The functions transfer, approve, transferFrom, increaseAllowance, and decreaseAllowance are unprotected and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in grantRole, revokeRole, and renounceRole
findings.description: The functions grantRole, revokeRole, and renounceRole are unprotected and can be called by anyone.
